- [x] Explain cause of commit blockage and fixes

---

**Explaining pre-commit mypy failure**

The failure is caused by the mypy pre-commit hook trying to install the
deprecated `types-all` extra, which depends on the now-absent
`types-pkg-resources` package. This blocks commits because `types-all` cannot be
resolved with current Python/pip versions. Fix options include removing
`types-all` from the pre-commit config or replacing it with explicit stub
packages needed.**Outlining pre-commit failure troubleshooting**

I'm identifying that the pre-commit failure is caused by the deprecated
types-pkg-resources missing from the types-all dependency, suggesting fixes like
removing or replacing types-all with types-setuptools in the config. Next, I'll
write a clear TODO list with steps to confirm the hook failure and propose fixes
for the user.**Explaining pre-commit block and fix options**

The commit is blocked because the pre-commit mypy hook tries downloading the
deprecated types-all dependency, which depends on the unavailable
types-pkg-resources package, causing an error. To fix this, edit
`.pre-commit-config.yaml` to remove or replace the `types-all` extra with
specific stub packages, then run `pre-commit clean && pre-commit install`;
optionally update hooks afterward. I'll mark the related task as done.The commit
is being blocked by the pre-commit hooks. Specifically, the `mypy` hook in
`.pre-commit-config.yaml` asks pip to install `types-all`, which now depends on
a yanked/nonexistent stub package (`types-pkg-resources`). Pip can’t find it, so
the hook fails, and git aborts the commit.

How to fix:

- Simplest: remove or narrow the `types-all` dependency in
  `.pre-commit-config.yaml` under the `mypy` hook. For example, delete
  `additional_dependencies: [types-all]` or replace it with only the stubs you
  actually need (e.g., `types-requests`, etc.).
- Then run: `pre-commit clean && pre-commit install` (or just retry the commit;
  pre-commit will reinstall environments).
- Optional: run `pre-commit autoupdate` to pull newer hook revisions, but the
  main issue is `types-all`.

Once `types-all` is gone or replaced, the hook should install cleanly and
commits will go through.

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="copilot_applyPatch">
<details>
<summary>Tool use: **copilot_applyPatch** • Using "Apply Patch"</summary>

```yaml
# Pre-commit Configuration
# Install: pip install pre-commit
# Setup: pre-commit install
# Run: pre-commit run --all-files

# See https://pre-commit.com for more information
# See https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html for more hooks

default_language_version:
  python: python3.11
  node: 18.17.0

repos:
  # General file checks
  - repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks
    rev: v4.5.0
    hooks:
      - id: trailing-whitespace
        args: [--markdown-linebreak-ext=md]
      - id: end-of-file-fixer
      - id: check-yaml
        args: [--allow-multiple-documents]
      - id: check-json
      - id: check-toml
      - id: check-added-large-files
        args: [--maxkb=1000]
      - id: check-merge-conflict
      - id: check-case-conflict
      - id: check-symlinks
      - id: destroyed-symlinks
      - id: mixed-line-ending
        args: [--fix=lf]
      - id: detect-private-key
      - id: check-executables-have-shebangs
      - id: check-shebang-scripts-are-executable

  # Git commit message checks
  - repo: https://github.com/compilerla/conventional-pre-commit
    rev: v3.0.0
    hooks:
      - id: conventional-pre-commit
        stages: [commit-msg]
        args: [--strict]

  # YAML formatting
  - repo: https://github.com/macisamuele/language-formatters-pre-commit-hooks
    rev: v2.11.0
    hooks:
      - id: pretty-format-yaml
        args: [--autofix, --indent, "2"]

  # Markdown formatting
  - repo: https://github.com/executablebooks/mdformat
    rev: 0.7.17
    hooks:
      - id: mdformat
        additional_dependencies:
          - mdformat-gfm
          - mdformat-tables
          - mdformat-toc
        args: [--wrap=80]

  # Shell script checks
  - repo: https://github.com/shellcheck-py/shellcheck-py
    rev: v0.9.0.6
    hooks:
      - id: shellcheck
        args: [--severity=warning]

  # Python hooks
  - repo: https://github.com/psf/black
    rev: 23.12.1
    hooks:
      - id: black
        language_version: python3.11

  - repo: https://github.com/pycqa/isort
    rev: 5.13.2
    hooks:
      - id: isort
        args: [--profile=black]

  - repo: https://github.com/pycqa/flake8
    rev: 7.0.0
    hooks:
      - id: flake8
        args: [--max-line-length=88, --extend-ignore=E203]

  - repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/mirrors-mypy
    rev: v1.8.0
    hooks:
      - id: mypy
        args: [--ignore-missing-imports]

  # JavaScript/TypeScript hooks
  - repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/mirrors-prettier
    rev: v3.1.0
    hooks:
      - id: prettier
        types_or: [javascript, jsx, ts, tsx, json, yaml, markdown]
        exclude: ^(package-lock\.json|yarn\.lock|pnpm-lock\.yaml)$

  - repo: https://github.com/pre-commit/mirrors-eslint
    rev: v8.56.0
    hooks:
      - id: eslint
        files: \.[jt]sx?$
        types: [file]
        additional_dependencies:
          - eslint@8.56.0
          - eslint-config-prettier@9.1.0

  # Docker
  - repo: https://github.com/hadolint/hadolint
    rev: v2.12.0
    hooks:
      - id: hadolint-docker
        args: [--ignore, DL3008, --ignore, DL3009]

  # Secrets detection
  - repo: https://github.com/Yelp/detect-secrets
    rev: v1.4.0
    hooks:
      - id: detect-secrets
        args: [--baseline, .secrets.baseline]
        exclude: package-lock.json

  # Security checks for Python
  - repo: https://github.com/PyCQA/bandit
    rev: 1.7.6
    hooks:
      - id: bandit
        args: [-c, .bandit]
        files: \.py$

  # Dependency security checks
  - repo: https://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hooks-safety
    rev: v1.3.3
    hooks:
      - id: python-safety-dependencies-check
        files: requirements.*\.txt$

  # Terraform (if used)
  - repo: https://github.com/antonbabenko/pre-commit-terraform
    rev: v1.86.0
    hooks:
      - id: terraform_fmt
      - id: terraform_validate
      - id: terraform_docs

  # Dockerfile linting
  - repo: https://github.com/AleksaC/hadolint-py
    rev: v2.12.0.3
    hooks:
      - id: hadolint

  # Go formatting (if used)
  - repo: https://github.com/dnephin/pre-commit-golang
    rev: v0.5.1
    hooks:
      - id: go-fmt
      - id: go-vet
      - id: go-imports
      - id: go-cyclo
        args: [-over=15]
      - id: golangci-lint

  # Rust formatting (if used)
  - repo: https://github.com/doublify/pre-commit-rust
    rev: v1.0
    hooks:
      - id: fmt
      - id: cargo-check
      - id: clippy

# CI-specific configuration
ci:
  autofix_commit_msg: "style: auto fixes from pre-commit hooks"
  autofix_prs: true
  autoupdate_commit_msg: "chore: pre-commit autoupdate"
  autoupdate_schedule: weekly
  skip: []
  submodules: false
```

</details>

---

**Removing types-all from pre-commit config**## actions taken

- Removed the `types-all` extra dependency from the `mypy` hook in
  `.pre-commit-config.yaml` to stop the failing install of the unavailable
  `types-pkg-resources`.

## next steps

- Run `pre-commit clean && pre-commit install` (optional but recommended) to
  refresh hook environments.
- Retry your commit. If you still want type stubs, add only the specific ones
  you need (e.g., `types-requests`) to `additional_dependencies`.

If anything else fails, let me know and I’ll dig deeper.
